thread.title: Technical Perspectives on Electrical Equipment Stocks -- A.O. Smith, Atkore, Babcock & Wilcox, Ballard Power Systems

author: cnbc.com
title: Technical Perspectives on Electrical Equipment Stocks -- A.O. Smith, Atkore, Babcock & Wilcox, Ballard Power Systems
text:
NEW YORK, March 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on AOS, ATKR, BW, and BLDP which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Featured today on WallStEquities.com are A.O. Smith Corp. (NYSE: AOS), Atkore International Group Inc. (NYSE: ATKR), Babcock & Wilcox Enterprises Inc. (NYSE: BW), and Ballard Power Systems Inc. (NASDAQ: BLDP). These stocks are part of the Industrial Electrical Equipment space, which produces electrical products that generate, distribute, and use electrical power. Major products include electrical motors, generators, lighting fixtures, switchboard tools, switchgear, and distribution transformers. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
A.O. Smith
Shares in Milwaukee, Wisconsin headquartered A.O. Smith Corp. rose 1.50%, ending Monday's trading session at $62.81. The stock recorded a trading volume of 947,220 shares. The Company's shares have gained 25.17% over the past year. The stock is trading 6.05% above its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of A.O. Smith, which manufactures and markets residential and commercial gas and electric water heaters, boilers, and water treatment products in North America, China, Europe, and India, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 44.77. Get the full research report on AOS for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=AOS
Atkore International Group
Harvey, Illinois headquartered Atkore International Group Inc.'s stock climbed 2.64%, closing the day at $20.98. A total volume of 627,024 shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 489,120 shares. The Company's shares are trading 2.36% above their 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Atkore International, which manufactures and distributes electrical raceway products in the US and internationally, have an RSI of 44.32.
On February 14 th , 2018, Atkore International (ATKR) announced an offering of 6,000,000 shares of its common stock on an underwritten basis by the selling stockholder, CD&R Allied Holdings, L.P. (CD&R), to Morgan Stanley, as the underwriter in a registered offering of these shares. No shares are being sold by ATKR. CD&R will receive all of the net proceeds from the offering and has granted Morgan Stanley a 30-day option to purchase up to an additional 900,000 shares of common stock. Access the free research report on ATKR now by signing up at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=ATKR
Babcock & Wilcox Enterprises
On Monday, shares in Charlotte, North Carolina-based Babcock & Wilcox Enterprises Inc. recorded a trading volume of 5.04 million shares, which was higher than their three months average volume of 1.31 million shares. The stock ended the day 3.80% higher at $5.74. The Company's shares have advanced 22.13% in the previous three months. The stock is trading below its 50-day moving average by 6.02%. Furthermore, shares of the Company, which provides fossil and renewable power generation and environmental equipment for the power and industrial markets worldwide, have an RSI of 40.63.
On March 01 st , 2018, Babcock & Wilcox announced its Q4 2017 results. Revenues for the quarter were $408.1 million; GAAP earnings per share were a loss of $2.44; adjusted earnings per share were a loss of $0.95; and adjusted EBITDA was $(17.0) million. The Company's cash and cash equivalents balance, net of restricted cash, was $56.7 million at December 31 st , 2017. Are you already registered with Wall St. Equities? Do so now for free, and get the report on BW at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=BW
Ballard Power Systems
Burnaby, Canada headquartered Ballard Power Systems Inc.'s stock dropped 2.45%, finishing yesterday's session at $3.18 with a total trading volume of 1.87 million shares. The Company's shares have advanced 53.62% over the past year. The stock is trading below its 200-day moving average by 16.33%. Additionally, shares of the Company, which engages in the design, development, manufacture, sale, and service of proton exchange membrane fuel cells worldwide, have an RSI of 40.40.
On February 28 th , 2018, Ballard Power Systems announced its consolidated financial results for Q4 and full year ended December 31 st , 2017. For Q4 2017, total revenue was USD$40.3 million, cash operating costs were USD$11.2 million, adjusted EBITDA was USD$2.1 million, and net loss was USD$(2.9) million. For the full year, total revenue was USD$121.3 million, cash operating costs were USD$39.1 million, adjusted EBITDA was USD$3.3 million, and net loss narrowed to USD$(8.0) million. Aspiring Member, please take a moment to register below for your free research report on BLDP at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=BLDP
